headline.print_headline: The Burkini: Muslim Modesty vs. French Norms
headline.main: The Burkini Debate: Muslim Modesty vs. French Norms

snippet: Readers differ on French enforcement of its burkini ban. Is it an infringement of Muslim women’s rights, or a reasonable insistence on assimilation?...
lead_paragraph: Readers differ on French enforcement of its burkini ban. Is it an infringement of Muslim women’s rights, or a reasonable insistence on assimilation?
